text: Scuol is a municipality of the district Inn in the canton of Graub√ºnden in Switzerland. It is the largest municipality by area in Switzerland. Scuol is a well known spa town and ski resort. It is the business center of the Unterengadin valley. On 1 January 2015, the former municipalities of Ardez, Guarda, Tarasp, Ftan and Sent merged into the muncipality of Scuol. == References == == Other websites == * Scuol website * Scuol tourism office * Scuol hospital Category:Municipalities in Inn District Category:Ski areas and resorts in Switzerland Category:Spa towns in Switzerland
title: Scuol
